items.title: Read This, Not That: Back-to-School Edition
items.description: NR writers propose alternatives to the usual fare found on schools’ required reading lists.

items.title: The Ethos of the Left Is Fracturing Friendships
items.description: The postmodern left dissolves the individual into a soup of identities and communities, making sincere bonds harder to forge.

items.title: Goodbye, August
items.description: At every age, I’ve tried to squeeze more and more out of Augusts that somehow seem to pass in a few flashes rather than languid weeks.

items.title: A Decade After Merkel’s Refugee Gamble
items.description: The former German chancellor’s call to action reshaped Europe’s politics, and the crisis remains unresolved ten years later.

items.title: Insights from a 1949 Guide for Housewives
items.description: What could I learn from a book directed at ‘the newcomer to running a home’?
